definition: straight/to straighten/fair and reasonable/frank/straightforward/(indicates continuing motion or action)/vertical/vertical downward stroke in Chinese characters
surname Zhi/Zhi (c. 2000 BC), fifth of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
role (theater)/to compete/ancient three legged wine vessel/third note of pentatonic scale
angle/corner/horn/horn-shaped/unit of money equal to 0.1 yuan, or 10 cents (a dime)/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Dry tuck-pointing blades are used on hand-held circular saws and small, right angle grinders.
sentences.chinese: 干校内指向刀片用于手持圆锯和小磨直角。

sentences.english: One is to argue geometrically that you have a right angle in here.
sentences.chinese: 第一种是几何办法，这是一个直角。

sentences.english: To simplify the algorithm implementation, I'll assume that walls are laid out at right angles.
sentences.chinese: 为了简化算法实现，假设墙的转弯都是直角的。

sentences.english: Mars, this week, edges slowly closer towards a right-angle with Jupiter.
sentences.chinese: 火星本周缓缓移近与木星成直角的位置。

sentences.english: An optional nickel-plated input unit and foot mounts are available for right-angle drive applications.
sentences.chinese: 可选的镀镍输入装置和脚坐骑为直角传动应用提供。

sentences.english: Dioica side of the table and into a straight line, mostly at right angles.
sentences.chinese: 桌的腿子与面成直线，多为直角。

sentences.english: The vertical angle refers to the difference between the vertical readings.
sentences.chinese: 竖直角则是两个方向的竖盘读数之差。

sentences.english: The upper arm meets the shoulder blade at approximately a right angle.
sentences.chinese: 上臂和肩胛骨交接处形成一个直角。

sentences.english: Further, the paper expounds the judicious method used to determine errors of right-angle prism.
sentences.chinese: 进而阐明了直角棱镜误差给定的合理方法。

sentences.english: The road turned square to the left.
sentences.chinese: 这条路成直角向左转去。

sentences.english: These are any planes passing through the body at right angles to both the median and coronal planes.
sentences.chinese: 与正中面和冠状面呈直角的任何平面。

sentences.english: Transverse dunes run are a right angle to the constant wind direction.
sentences.chinese: 横向沙丘与风的方向始终处于直角。

sentences.english: It is normal if two hands are in a line and perpendiculars to the floor.
sentences.chinese: 标准姿势就是两只手在一条直线上与地面成直角。

sentences.english: I create a light, bright space with lots of right angles.
sentences.chinese: 一般是创造一种明亮敞快的空间，配上大量的直角。

sentences.english: Keep poit arc and 90 degree plate, no hurt to right-angle.
sentences.chinese: 可保留印刷上圆弧角及自动装版的90度直角。
